Description: Built-in wash bay complete system (equipment + containment + drainage + water treatment/recycling + HVAC modification for heated wash area; installed in PW bay area)
SourceRef: Optional_Items_Pricing.csv row OPT-01 (RecommendedPrice); FALLBACK per DEC-EST-001
Notes: REQUIRES VENDOR QUOTE REPLACEMENT. Range: $75000-$120000. Includes equipment + containment + drainage + water treatment/recycling + HVAC modification. Excludes base bay sump (DEL-02-05) and base mechanical rough-in (DEL-02-05). Excludes structural modifications (DEL-02-04).

Description: Wash bay plumbing/drainage modifications (hot/cold water supply; floor drain; containment curb; connection to separator)
SourceRef: Optional_Items_Pricing.csv row OPT-02 (RecommendedPrice); FALLBACK per DEC-EST-001
Notes: REQUIRES VENDOR QUOTE REPLACEMENT. Range: $12000-$20000. Dedicated wash bay plumbing beyond base building rough-in. Excludes base building bay sumps (DEL-02-05). Excludes base building mechanical rough-in to wash bay location (DEL-02-05).

Description: Wash bay environmental compliance -- effluent treatment (oil/water separator; possible connection to municipal sewer; AEPA requirements TBD)
SourceRef: Optional_Items_Pricing.csv row OPT-03 (RecommendedPrice); FALLBACK per DEC-EST-001
Notes: REQUIRES VENDOR QUOTE REPLACEMENT. Range: $8000-$18000. AEP/Town regulatory requirements unresolved (DEP-05-01-E04). Cost highly sensitive to regulatory outcome. Excludes base building bay sumps (DEL-02-05).
